def calculate_minimum_path_cost(n, costs):
    x = 1
    ans = costs[0] * n + costs[1] * n
    i = 2
    a = costs[0]
    b = costs[1]
    sa = costs[0]
    sb = costs[1]
    aa = bb = 1
    cura = costs[0] * n
    curb = costs[1] * n
    for i in range(2, n):
        if x:
            if costs[i] < b:
                curb = sb + costs[i] * (n - bb)
                ans = min(ans, cura + curb)
                b = costs[i]
            else:
                curb = curb - b + costs[i]
            bb += 1
            sb += costs[i]
        else:
            if costs[i] < a:
                cura = sa + costs[i] * (n - aa)
                ans = min(ans, cura + curb)
                a = costs[i]
            else:
                cura = cura - a + costs[i]
            aa += 1
            sa += costs[i]
        x ^= 1
    return ans
